A physical calendar with a smart assistant built-in, that can help you keep track of your appointments, reminders, and deadlines.
A calendar with a built-in speaker, so you can hear the days of the week and dates.
A calendar with a built-in camera, so you can take a picture of your notes and reminders.
A calendar with a built-in timer, so you can set a timer for your reminders and deadlines.
A calendar with a built-in GPS, so you can set reminders for events based on your location.
